title: Three bike lifters nabbed, six stolen motorcycles seized
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 01 (APP):Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT)Police’s Koral police team busted a notorious motorcycle-lifting gang by nabbing three wanted members and seizing six stolen motorcycles from their possession.
An official told APP on Sunday that the Koral police team apprehended the accused with the help of technical and human intelligence. The arrested individuals were identified as Hamid, Bilawal Rasheed, and Nadeem Ali, who were involved in numerous bike-lifting incidents.
He said that six stolen motorcycles were recovered from the possession of the accused. He said that cases were already registered against the suspects, while further investigation was underway.
DIG Operations Muhammad Jawad Tariq directed all officers to intensify the crackdown against criminal elements and take every possible measure to ensure the safety of citizens’ lives and property.
